entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
